data.actual_result: The "arrow"/clipboard option stays ontop of the channel drawer or takes some seconds until it vanishes
data.expected_result: The "arrow"/clipboard option should close together with the chat field
data.short_description: The "arrow" that appears when you hold down on a chat field stays when you open the channel drawer
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold down on the chat field until the "arrow"/option to open the clipboard opens - Open the channel drawer either with the back button (if you have that enabled) or the "normal" way
